name: Espresso Shot
description: A rich, bold shot of pure espresso with a robust flavor.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water for a smooth and bold flavor.

name: Cappuccino
description: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foam for a velvety texture.

name: Latte
description: A creamy blend of espresso and steamed milk, topped with light foam.

name: Macchiato
description: A bold shot of espresso 'stained' with a dollop of frothy milk.

name: Mocha Latte
description: Espresso combined with chocolate syrup, steamed milk, and whipped cream.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: A layered coffee drink with vanilla syrup, espresso, steamed milk, and caramel drizzle.

name: Vanilla Latte
description: A smooth latte with a touch of sweet vanilla syrup.

name: Hazelnut Cappuccino
description: A nutty twist on the classic cappuccino with hazelnut syrup.

name: Flat White
description: A double shot of espresso with velvety steamed milk.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Freshly brewed coffee served over ice for a crisp and refreshing drink.

name: Cold Brew
description: Smooth and naturally sweet coffee, brewed cold for 12 hours.

name: Iced Latte
description: Espresso with cold milk over ice for a refreshing treat.

name: Iced Mocha
description: Espresso, chocolate syrup, cold milk, and ice topped with whipped cream.

name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
description: A chilled version of the caramel macchiato with caramel drizzle.

name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
description: A cozy blend of espresso, pumpkin spice, steamed milk, and whipped cream.

name: Peppermint Mocha
description: Espresso with chocolate and peppermint syrups, steamed milk, and whipped cream.

name: Cinnamon Dolce Latte
description: A sweet and spiced latte with cinnamon dolce syrup and whipped cream.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Creamy steamed milk blended with rich chocolate, topped with whipped cream.

name: Chai Tea Latte
description: A spiced tea concentrate blended with steamed milk.

name: Matcha Latte
description: A creamy blend of matcha green tea and steamed milk, lightly sweetened.

name: Earl Grey Tea
description: A fragrant black tea infused with bergamot citrus for a classic flavor.

name: English Breakfast Tea
description: A robust blend of black tea, perfect for starting your day.

name: Mint Green Tea
description: A refreshing green tea with a burst of minty freshness.

name: Chamomile Tea
description: A calming herbal tea with floral and apple-like notes.

name: Lemonade
description: A zesty, refreshing blend of fresh lemon juice and sugar.

name: Iced Tea
description: A chilled black tea with a hint of lemon, served over ice.

name: Hot Apple Cider
description: A warm, spiced apple cider perfect for cozy moments.

name: Sparkling Water
description: Effervescent sparkling water for a refreshing sip.

name: Fruit Smoothie
description: A blend of fresh fruits, yogurt, and juice for a healthy drink.
